name: Status Saver
description: Loved a Friends Status? Well, You are at the Right App page   How to Use?  1 - Check the Desired Status/Story... 2 - Open Status Saver, Click on any Image or Video to View... 3 - Click the Save Button...   OR  1 - Check the Desired Status/Story... 2 - Hold on a Status to Enable Multi Selection, 3 - Select Save from the Toolbar Menu!  The Status Image/Video is Instantly saved to your Gallery!    The Only App in the Store which shows you Statuses from 4 Different Apps/Environments! They include -  1) Normal Statuses, 2) G.B Statuses, 3) Business Statuses, 4) Normal Statuses from Parallel Space Pro!   Notable Features: * Multi Save, Delete, Repost / Share, Delete, * Easy Repost even without Saving, * Easy & Fast Saving, * Built in Image Viewer & Video Player, * Easy Navigation!         Still Reading this?  Go get the App & start Saving Statuses  Hey wait, Please do give a Good Rating if you liked the App!  Probably a 5 Star
